verses.text: The \w proverbs|strong="H4912"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*. A \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* maketh a \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: but a \w foolish|strong="H3684"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \add is\add* the \w heaviness|strong="H8424"\w* of his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*.

\w Treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w* \w profit|strong="H3276"\w* nothing: but \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w delivereth|strong="H5337"\w* from \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will not \w suffer|strong="H7456"\w* the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* to \w famish|strong="H7456"\w*: but he casteth \w away|strong="H1920"\w* the \w substance|strong="H1942"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.\f + \fr 10.3 \ft the substance…: or, the wicked for their wickedness\f*

He becometh \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* that \w dealeth|strong="H6213"\w* \add with\add* a \w slack|strong="H7423"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*: but the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w diligent|strong="H2742"\w* maketh \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*.

He that \w gathereth|strong="H0103"\w* in \w summer|strong="H7019"\w* \add is\add* a \w wise|strong="H7919"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*: \add but\add* he that \w sleepeth|strong="H7290"\w* in \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* \add is\add* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w* that causeth \w shame|strong="H0954"\w*.

\w Blessings|strong="H1293"\w* \add are\add* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w just|strong="H6662"\w*: but \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

The \w memory|strong="H2143"\w* of the \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \add is\add* \w blessed|strong="H1293"\w*: but the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall \w rot|strong="H7537"\w*.

The \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* will \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*: but a \w prating|strong="H8193"\w* \w fool|strong="H0191"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H3832"\w*.\f + \fr 10.8 \ft a prating…: Heb. a fool of lips\f*\f + \fr 10.8 \ft fall: Heb. be beaten\f*

He that \w walketh|strong="H3212"\w* \w uprightly|strong="H8537"\w* \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* \w surely|strong="H0983"\w*: but he that \w perverteth|strong="H6140"\w* his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* shall be \w known|strong="H3045"\w*.

He that \w winketh|strong="H7169"\w* with the \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w causeth|strong="H5414"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H6094"\w*: but a \w prating|strong="H8193"\w* \w fool|strong="H0191"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H3832"\w*.\f + \fr 10.10 \ft fall: Heb. be beaten\f*

The \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of a \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add man is\add* a \w well|strong="H4726"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w*: but \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.
\w Hatred|strong="H8135"\w* stirreth \w up|strong="H5782"\w* \w strifes|strong="H4090"\w*: but \w love|strong="H0160"\w* \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* all \w sins|strong="H6588"\w*.

In the \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* of him that hath \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* is \w found|strong="H4672"\w*: but a \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* \add is\add* for the \w back|strong="H1460"\w* of him that is \w void|strong="H2638"\w* of \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*.\f + \fr 10.13 \ft of understanding: Heb. of heart\f*

\w Wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add men\add* lay \w up|strong="H6845"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*: but the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w foolish|strong="H0191"\w* \add is\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w destruction|strong="H4288"\w*.

The rich \w man’s|strong="H6223"\w* \w wealth|strong="H1952"\w* \add is\add* his \w strong|strong="H5797"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w*: the \w destruction|strong="H4288"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \add is\add* their \w poverty|strong="H7389"\w*.

The \w labour|strong="H6468"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add tendeth\add* to \w life|strong="H2416"\w*: the \w fruit|strong="H8393"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*.

He \add is in\add* the \w way|strong="H0734"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w* that \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*: but he that \w refuseth|strong="H5800"\w* \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w* \w erreth|strong="H8582"\w*.\f + \fr 10.17 \ft erreth: or, causeth to err\f*

He that \w hideth|strong="H3680"\w* \w hatred|strong="H8135"\w* \add with\add* \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, and he that \w uttereth|strong="H3318"\w* a \w slander|strong="H1681"\w*, \add is\add* a \w fool|strong="H3684"\w*.

In the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of \w words|strong="H1697"\w* there \w wanteth|strong="H2308"\w* not \w sin|strong="H6588"\w*: but he that \w refraineth|strong="H2820"\w* his \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \add is\add* \w wise|strong="H7919"\w*.

The \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* of the \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \add is as\add* \w choice|strong="H0977"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*: the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add is\add* little \w worth|strong="H4592"\w*.

The \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*: but \w fools|strong="H0191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* for \w want|strong="H2638"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="H3820"\w*.\f + \fr 10.21 \ft of wisdom: Heb. of heart\f*
The \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, it maketh \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*, and he \w addeth|strong="H3254"\w* no \w sorrow|strong="H6089"\w* with it.

\add It is\add* as \w sport|strong="H7814"\w* to a \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w mischief|strong="H2154"\w*: but a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* hath \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.

The \w fear|strong="H4034"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, it shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon him: but the \w desire|strong="H8378"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall be \w granted|strong="H5414"\w*.

As the \w whirlwind|strong="H5492"\w* \w passeth|strong="H5674"\w*, so \add is\add* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* no \add more:\add* but the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add is\add* an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3247"\w*.

As \w vinegar|strong="H2558"\w* to the \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*, and as \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* to the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, so \add is\add* the \w sluggard|strong="H6102"\w* to them that \w send|strong="H7971"\w* him.

The \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w prolongeth|strong="H3254"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: but the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall be \w shortened|strong="H7114"\w*.\f + \fr 10.27 \ft prolongeth: Heb. addeth\f*

The \w hope|strong="H8431"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add shall be\add* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*: but the \w expectation|strong="H8615"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.

The \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* to the \w upright|strong="H8537"\w*: but \w destruction|strong="H4288"\w* \add shall be\add* to the \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*.

The \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall \w never|strong="H5769"\w* be \w removed|strong="H4131"\w*: but the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall not \w inhabit|strong="H7931"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

The \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w just|strong="H6662"\w* bringeth \w forth|strong="H5107"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*: but the \w froward|strong="H8419"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* shall be cut \w out|strong="H3772"\w*.

The \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* what is \w acceptable|strong="H7522"\w*: but the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add speaketh\add* \w frowardness|strong="H8419"\w*.\f + \fr 10.32 \ft frowardness: Heb. frowardnesses\f*
